Name: Society's Paradigms
About the game: story The Golden God is soon to be left out of his prison. The blood moon rises as the believers pray for salvation... World generation No other playthrough is the same as the previous one, so you have to discover new possibilities to finish your job Choices matter Side with the ruling party to restore the order of a crumbling world or lead a new movement governed by your own ideas and beliefs. Obtain different outcomes in certain situations depending on your own actions Fast-Paced Combat Immersive hack and slash combat and satisfying combos Skills Discover new skills depending on how you play the game, so you can make each run unique
